sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO PSNL0127 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SOCTY_INSUR_YR , HLTH_INSUR_FLUC_DT , HLTH_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , HLTH_INSR_MNTH_RUNTN_AMNT , HLTH_INSR_GRDE , HLTH_INSR_CERT_NUM , NAT_PENN_INSUR_FLUC_DT , NAT_PENN_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , NAT_PENN_GRDE , HLTH_INSR_APPTN_YN , NAT_PENN_APPTN_YN , UMYT_INSR_APPTN_YN , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_APPTN_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , UMYT_INSR_FLUC_DT , UMYT_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , UMYT_INSR_PAY_MNTH_AMNT , IDTL_ACCDT_FLUC_DT , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_TOT_AMNT , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_MNTH_AMNT ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , NVL( ( SELECT SUBSTR(AA.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, 0, 4) FROM PSNL0110 AA WHERE AA.EMYMT_BGNN_DT = ( SELECT MAX(BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT) FROM PSNL0110 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.EMYMT_TYP_CD = AA.EMYMT_TYP_CD )
AND AA.EMYMT_TYP_CD = 'A0420010' AND AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND ROWNUM=1) , #soctyInsurYr# ) , #hlthInsurFlucDt# , #hlthInsrPayTotAmnt# , #hlthInsrMnthRuntnAmnt# , #hlthInsrGrde# , #hlthInsrCertNum# , #natPennInsurFlucDt# , #natPennStdIncmMnthAmnt# , #natPennGrde# , #hlthInsrApptnYn# , #natPennApptnYn# , #umytInsrApptnYn# , #idtlAccdtInsurApptnYn# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# , #umytInsrFlucDt# , #umytInsrPayTotAmnt# , #umytInsrPayMnthAmnt# , #idtlAccdtFlucDt# , #idtlAccdtPayTotAmnt# , #idtlAccdtPayMnthAmnt# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PSNL0127 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , SOCTY_INSUR_YR=#soctyInsurYr# , HLTH_INSUR_FLUC_DT=#hlthInsurFlucDt# , HLTH_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT=#hlthInsrPayTotAmnt# , HLTH_INSR_MNTH_RUNTN_AMNT=#hlthInsrMnthRuntnAmnt# , HLTH_INSR_GRDE=#hlthInsrGrde# , HLTH_INSR_CERT_NUM=#hlthInsrCertNum# , NAT_PENN_INSUR_FLUC_DT=#natPennInsurFlucDt# , NAT_PENN_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT=#natPennStdIncmMnthAmnt# , NAT_PENN_GRDE=#natPennGrde# , HLTH_INSR_APPTN_YN=#hlthInsrApptnYn# , NAT_PENN_APPTN_YN=#natPennApptnYn# , UMYT_INSR_APPTN_YN=#umytInsrApptnYn# , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_APPTN_YN=#idtlAccdtInsurApptnYn# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , UMYT_INSR_FLUC_DT=#umytInsrFlucDt# , UMYT_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT=#umytInsrPayTotAmnt# , UMYT_INSR_PAY_MNTH_AMNT=#umytInsrPayMnthAmnt# , IDTL_ACCDT_FLUC_DT=#idtlAccdtFlucDt# , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_TOT_AMNT=#idtlAccdtPayTotAmnt# , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_MNTH_AMNT=#idtlAccdtPayMnthAmnt# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND SOCTY_INSUR_YR=#soctyInsurYr#

UPDATE PSNL0127 SET HLTH_INSR_MNTH_RUNTN_AMNT=#hlthInsrMnthRuntnAmnt# , NAT_PENN_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT=#natPennStdIncmMnthAmnt# , HLTH_INSR_APPTN_YN=#hlthInsrApptnYn# , NAT_PENN_APPTN_YN=#natPennApptnYn# , UMYT_INSR_APPTN_YN=#umytInsrApptnYn# , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_APPTN_YN=#idtlAccdtInsurApptnYn# , UMYT_INSR_PAY_MNTH_AMNT=#umytInsrPayMnthAmnt# , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_MNTH_AMNT=#idtlAccdtPayMnthAmnt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND SOCTY_INSUR_YR=#soctyInsurYr#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PSNL0127 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PSNL0127 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SOCTY_INSUR_YR , HLTH_INSUR_FLUC_DT , HLTH_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , HLTH_INSR_MNTH_RUNTN_AMNT , NAT_PENN_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , HLTH_INSR_APPTN_YN , NAT_PENN_APPTN_YN , UMYT_INSR_APPTN_YN , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_APPTN_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #soctyInsurYr# , #hlthInsurFlucDt# , #hlthInsrPayTotAmnt# , #hlthInsrMnthRuntnAmnt# , #natPennStdIncmMnthAmnt# , #hlthInsrApptnYn# , #natPennApptnYn# , #umytInsrApptnYn# , #idtlAccdtInsurApptnYn# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SOCTY_INSUR_YR , HLTH_INSUR_FLUC_DT , HLTH_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , HLTH_INSR_MNTH_RUNTN_AMNT , HLTH_INSR_GRDE , HLTH_INSR_CERT_NUM , NAT_PENN_INSUR_FLUC_DT , NAT_PENN_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , NAT_PENN_GRDE , HLTH_INSR_APPTN_YN , NAT_PENN_APPTN_YN , UMYT_INSR_APPTN_YN , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_APPTN_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , UMYT_INSR_FLUC_DT , UMYT_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , UMYT_INSR_PAY_MNTH_AMNT , IDTL_ACCDT_FLUC_DT , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_TOT_AMNT , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_MNTH_AMNT FROM PSNL0127 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PSNL0127 SET REVN_DT= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , HLTH_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT=#hlthInsrPayTotAmnt# , HLTH_INSR_MNTH_RUNTN_AMNT=#hlthInsrMnthRuntnAmnt# , NAT_PENN_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT=#natPennStdIncmMnthAmnt# , HLTH_INSR_APPTN_YN=#hlthInsrApptnYn# , NAT_PENN_APPTN_YN=#natPennApptnYn# , UMYT_INSR_APPTN_YN=#umytInsrApptnYn# , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_APPTN_YN=#idtlAccdtInsurApptnYn# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PSNL0127 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SOCTY_INSUR_YR , HLTH_INSUR_FLUC_DT , HLTH_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , HLTH_INSR_MNTH_RUNTN_AMNT , HLTH_INSR_GRDE , HLTH_INSR_CERT_NUM , NAT_PENN_INSUR_FLUC_DT , NAT_PENN_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , NAT_PENN_GRDE , HLTH_INSR_APPTN_YN , NAT_PENN_APPTN_YN , UMYT_INSR_APPTN_YN , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_APPTN_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , UMYT_INSR_FLUC_DT , UMYT_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , UMYT_INSR_PAY_MNTH_AMNT , IDTL_ACCDT_FLUC_DT , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_TOT_AMNT , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_MNTH_AMNT FROM PSNL0127 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SOCTY_INSUR_YR , HLTH_INSUR_FLUC_DT , HLTH_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , HLTH_INSR_MNTH_RUNTN_AMNT , UMYT_INSR_PAY_MNTH_AMNT , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_MNTH_AMNT , NAT_PENN_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , HLTH_INSR_APPTN_YN , NAT_PENN_APPTN_YN , UMYT_INSR_APPTN_YN , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_APPTN_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PSNL0127 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
AND SOCTY_INSUR_YR=#soctyInsurYr#
AND HLTH_INSUR_FLUC_DT=#hlthInsurFlucDt#
